com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.location
Interface LocationBinding

public interface LocationBinding

A representation of the model object 'Binding'. A container for location binding definitions that are defined outside of a topology.

The following features are supported:

  • Binding Entry
  • Context
  • Name
  • Topology

See Also:
LocationPackage.getLocationBinding()
